english_example_sentence: My dear family, may you live a long and happy life.
russian_example_sentence: Моя дорогая семья, желаю вам прожить долгую и счастливую жизнь.
turkish_example_sentence: Sevgili ailem, uzun ve mutlu bir hayat yaşayasınız.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sevgili ailem, uzun ve mutlu bir hayat ______.
